articles.title: Joint Appeal on 93rd Anniversary of March First Uprising
articles.content:
Joint Appeal on 93rd Anniversary of March First Uprising
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation of the north side and the Council for the Peace and Reunification of Tangun's Nation of the south side released the following joint appeal Thursday on the 93rd anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising:
					Today marks the 93rd anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising, an event recorded in the Korean history of struggle against foreign forces.
					
					Still ringing in our ears are the shouts for independence made by the Koreans waging unflinching actions in high spirit to win back the sovereignty of the country from the armed Japanese imperialists.
					
					Even though 93 years have passed since the uprising, the misery and wounds the Japanese imperialist gangsters left on the Koreans still remain unhealed in their minds.
					
					However, Japan, far from making an honest apology and reparation for their serious crimes, is seeking to make reinvasion, being engrossed in the moves to distort history and seize Tok Islets.
					
					The conservative ruling forces of south Korea, availing themselves of the Japanese moves for reinvasion, committed such treacherous act of betrayal of the country and the people as selling Tok Islets, part of the inviolable territory of Korea, to Japan without hesitation.
					
					The present reality urgently demands the 70 million Koreans to unite as one to force Japan to redress its past crimes, wipe the group of traitors out of this territory and accomplish the historic cause of national dignity, sovereignty, peace and reunification.
					
					We earnestly appeal to all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas to fulfill their duty as a member of the Tangun nation in response to the demand of the Koreans and call of the times.
					
					Let all Koreans wage a more dynamic mass movement to wrest from Japan an apology and reparation for the shuddering crimes.  
					
					Let us foil the revival of Japanese militarism and reject in unity its moves for reinvasion.
					
					Independence is what keeps the nation alive and dependence on foreign forces leads to ruin.
					
					Let us reject the uncalled-for interference and pressure by the foreign forces through escalated actions against foreign forces from the stand of maintaining national independence and prioritizing the nation's interests.
					
					Never allow the treachery of the conservative forces who take to flunkeyism by relying on foreign forces.
					
					Support and maintain the June 15 joint declaration and its action programme October 4 declaration.
					
					This year marks the 5th anniversary of the publication of the historic October 4 declaration. Let us stir up throughout the country the atmosphere of supporting and carrying out the declaration this year together with the organizations and personages aspiring after the implementation of the north-south joint declaration and peace and national reunification. 
					
					Let us advance the June 15 reunification era by achieving the reconciliation and unity of the nation.
					
					Let us mark this year as a year of victory for pro-reunification patriotic forces by overwhelming the anti-reunification forces in and out in the spirit of becoming benefactors and building a paradise under the banner of "By our nation itself." 
					
					At this moment there go on dangerous war moves threatening the destiny of the nation to impose the nuclear disaster upon it.
					
					Let us turn out as one in the campaign for peace against war to hinder and foil the reckless war exercises that threaten well-being and peace of the nation.
					
					No force on earth can arrest the united Koreans in their grand and vigorous march for independence and reunification demonstrating the spirit of the homogenous nation with Tangun as the nation's founder.
					
					Let us make a breakthrough toward independence, peace and reunification without fail by meeting all challenges in the way of reunification and staging a dynamic reunification movement with fresh conviction under the banner of the historic north-south joint declaration.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The delegations of China, Russia, Mongolia, Vietnam and Kazakhstan participating in the international railways meeting of Asian countries of the Organization of Railways Cooperation visited Mangyongdae on Thursday.
					Being briefed on the revolutionary life of President Kim Il Sung who devoted his whole life for the prosperity of the country and the people's happiness and the development of the friendly relations among countries and of his family members, the guests looked round the relics at his old home.
					
					They had their photos taken in front of the old home of the President.
					
					The delegations also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Arch of Triumph, the Pyongyang Metro, etc. and enjoyed the grand art performance "We Will Be Loyal down through Generations" to commemorate the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Council of Ministers of Bosnia-Herzegovina
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Council of Ministers of Bosnia-Herzegovina
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim sent a message of congratulation to Viekaslav Bevanda upon his appointment as prime minister of the Council of Ministers of Bosnia-Herzegovina on Feb. 29.
					The message wished him success in his work for the prosperity of the country and the people's wellbeing.
					
					On the same day, Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to Zlatka Lagumdzija upon his appointment as foreign minister of Bosnia-Herzegovina.

articles.title: Congratulations to Algerian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Algerian President
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of congratulation to Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of Algeria, on his birthday.
					Kim in the message said he is rejoiced over the achievements made by the Algerian people to consolidate the national unity and make the socio-economic progress under the correct leadership of the president.
					
					Expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Algeria would grow stronger, he sincerely wished the president good health and happiness.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Finland
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Finland
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Sauli Niinisto on his election as president of Finland.
					Kim in his message wished the president success in his future work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Gifts Presented to Kim Il Sung by Peruvian
articles.content:
Gifts Presented to Kim Il Sung by Peruvian
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The exhibits at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the DPRK include a silk banner, silver tray and pamphlets the chairman of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship presented to President Kim Il Sung as gifts.
					In the upper part the silk banner has the sun embroidered with golden thread on a red ground. Seen in its center are the Arch of Triumph in Pyongyang and Spanish letters reading "Congratulations to the great President Kim Il Sung on his 80th birthday".
					
					Inscribed in the silver tray are words "Present to the great leader President Kim Il Sung on his 80th birthday by the Peruvian Celebration Preparatory Committee on April 15, 1992".
					
					The pamphlets, written by the chairman, are titled "Meeting with the Great Sun of Humankind", "Kim Il Sung, Iron-willed Commander", "Korean- style Socialism" and "Golden Fruits". They deal with great exploits of the President.
					
					The gifts reflect the chairman's admiration for the exploits the President performed for the independence of humankind.

articles.title: Music Director of Seoul Municipal Orchestra Leaves
articles.content:
Music Director of Seoul Municipal Orchestra Leaves
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Jong Myong Hun, music director of the Seoul Municipal Orchestra who is also music director of the Radio Philharmonic Orchestra of France, and his party, left here on Thursday.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation, Players Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation, Players Back Home
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Association came back here on Thursday after taking part in the commemorations in Vietnam on the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					On the same day the DPRK players arrived after participating in the 2012 Women's Judo World Cup in Warsaw.

articles.title: DPRK Marathoners Qualified for 30th Olympic Games
articles.content:
DPRK Marathoners Qualified for 30th Olympic Games
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- DPRK marathoners won qualification for the 30th Olympic Games due in London this summer.
					In this regard, KCNA had an interview with Ko Myong Chol, vice-director of the Sports Science Institute under the Academy of Sports Science.
					
					Question: I think that traditionally, the Korean people have been highly interested in marathon. 
					
					Answer: You are right. 
					
					Son Ki Jong finished first in men's marathon event of the 11th Olympic Games, when Korea was under the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule, and Jong Song Ok rose to fame in the world as marathon queen.
					
					Traditionally, Koreans have had a liking for running.
					
					An old Chinese book says ancient Koreans ran as fast as deer and that ten people, believed to be able to run 400 kilometers a day, had once visited China from Koguryo Kingdom (277 B.C.-668 A.D.)
					
					In the 18th century, Korean scholars termed the liking "inborn", attributing it to geological conditions of the country with many mountains and hills.
					
					Prior to the present-day athletic event, there were traditional track meets in Korea.
					
					It has been told that towards the end of Ri Dynasty (1392-1910) there appeared a man who ran 200 kilometers from Jonju to Seoul in 12 hours.
					
					This testifies to the fact that the Korean nation is constitutionally strong in persistence and endurance.

articles.title: Remains of DPRK Hero Buried at Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
Remains of DPRK Hero Buried at Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The remains of Pak Thae Son, miner of workteam No. 5 of Yonggwang Pit of the Kumgol Mine of the Komdok Mining Complex, was buried at the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in the suburbs of Pyongyang with due ceremony on Thursday.
					He laid down his life to save his colleague at a critical moment.
					
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un highly appreciated his heroic deed and put him forward as the DPRK Hero to be known by the people around the country.
					
					Attending the ceremony were officials concerned, officials of the Complex, miners, bereaved family members and relatives of the deceased.
					
					The remains of the deceased were buried in the grave. 
					
					The participants placed a wreath and bunches of flowers at the grave of the martyr and observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased.

articles.title: February Issue of Bulletin Thongil Published
articles.content:
February Issue of Bulletin Thongil Published
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans published the February issue of Bulletin Thongil.
					It carried a photo of the great leader Kim Jong Il smiling.
					
					An article in a special section to commemorate the 70th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il was titled "Brilliant life of great man".
					
					It said that nearly 70 years of Kim Jong Il's life were the history of the great man devoted to the happiness of the people and the prosperity of the country.
					
					The bulletin gave much space to the news that the title of Generalissimo of the DPRK was awarded to leader Kim Jong Il, the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il riding on horses together were erected and Order of Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize and Kim Jong Il Children Honor Prize were instituted on the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					It also carried news that a DPRK book, photo and handcraft exhibition was held in Russia and a reception given at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					It edited news of revolutionary activities of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					It carried content of reports of Russia's media asserting that Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills staged by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are the DPRK-targeted war drills which render the situation on the Korean peninsula extremely tense.

articles.title: New Diamond Drill Bit Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Diamond Drill Bit Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A diamond research group at the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK succeeded in making a new kind of diamond drill bit by thermal compression at low temperature.
					The new bit is good in ensuring drill's safe operation and raising the tempo of prospecting work. 
					
					The research group also developed high-performance drilling tools needed to widen drilling hole and built a base for their production. 
					
					The newly developed bit is of great technological and economic significance.
					
					This development makes it possible to produce high-performance diamond bit with locally available raw materials.
					
					The new bit has already been accepted by some prospecting units, mines and collieries in the country.

articles.title: Fruit Farms on Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Fruit Farms on Increase in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- New fruit farms have made their appearances one after another in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					In this regard, KCNA had an interview with the vice-director of the Korean Fruits Corporation, Han Sung Hyon.
					
					He said:
					
					The Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm has turned into one of the nation's leading fruit producers in two years.
					
					About 1 000 hectares of farmland were rezoned, with millions of dwarf apple trees planted there in a three-stage way.
					
					Now it has become a fruit supplier to Pyongyang citizens.
					
					The Kosan Fruit Farm in Kangwon Province has finished rezoning farmland and covered hundreds of hectares of orchards with dwarf apple trees in a short period.
					
					Following the example of the Ryongjon Fruit Farm, all other fruit farms in South Hamgyong Province have pressed ahead with farmland rezoning in order to plant high-yield strains of fruit trees.
					
					When the rebuilding of fruit farms in Pukchong County is completed, the county will get thousands of hectares of orchards.
					
					North Phyongan Province has taken the Songhan Fruit Farm as a model, while South and North Hwanghae provinces have channeled big efforts into putting their orchards on a modern basis.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Ridicules Rigmarole Let Loose by S. Korean Warmongers
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules Rigmarole Let Loose by S. Korean Warmongers
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean group of traitors made strange remarks after kicking off Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises in collusion with the U.S. defying domestic and foreign protest. 
					As regards the warning served by the DPRK to the south not to go reckless, the person in authority of "the government" talked such nonsense as "they are under extreme stress" and "they are going crazy as they are required to undergo counter-exercises".
					
					The group of traitors is misjudging the will of the DPRK to strongly react against the enemy's provocation.
					
					It is the DPRK's revolutionary principle and the toughest stand to react to the "retaliation" of the enemies in kind and a total war in kind.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK are filled with the conviction of sure victory and will to completely blow up the bulwark of aggression by mobilizing all means including nuclear deterrent if the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers intrude into the inviolable sky, ground and sea of the DPRK even 0.001 mm.
					
					This was the DPRK's warning served to the enemies.
					
					What the group uttered this or that about this warning is nothing but last-ditch shriek of those scared by the spirit of the DPRK which does not make an empty talk. And it is a foolish attempt to boost the morale of the puppet army seized with war phobia and war-weariness. 
					
					Ridiculous are the authorities' reckless remarks that the "Cheonan" warship sinking case was something orchestrated by the north as "revenge" for Key Resolve.
					
					This was nothing but blasphemous remarks made by the hooligans against the DPRK.
					
					The "Cheonan" warship sinking case was a hideous anti-DPRK farce orchestrated by the group hell-bent on confrontation with compatriots, claiming the lives of even dozens of seamen during Key Resolve and Foal Eagle two years back.
					
					It is absolutely intolerable that the group again pulled up the DPRK, painting the above-said case as a "provocation from the north, timed to coincide with the kick-off of Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					
					The above-said reckless remarks of the Lee Myung Bak group more dead than alive, isolated from the public are nothing but a foolish attempt to facelift its image and bring the north-south relations to the worst phase by fabricating the second "Cheonan" warship case.
					
					What the person in authority of south Korea uttered is no more than a publicity stunt to orchestrate a new hideous anti-DPRK burlesque while the war maneuvers are under way and justify it. 
					
					The traitors to the nation with whom Koreans cannot live under the same sky are going too reckless, utterly ignorant of their rival.
					
					No one can imagine the potential of defense capability for self-defence in the DPRK. It has matchless armed forces fully ready for both a total war and a local war.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK have a will to mercilessly punish the enemies coming in attack on it recklessly. 
					
					The DPRK has served enough warning. They will be held wholly responsible for all the consequences of ignoring that warning.  
					
					The group would be well advised to halt its rash actions.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Refutes Reptile Internet Paper's Misinformation about Education of Children
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Refutes Reptile Internet Paper's Misinformation about Education of Children
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Seoul Sinmun (Internet) echoed an article posted on internet media " New Focus" of "defectors from the north" in which it talked nonsense about the issue of education of younger generation in the DPRK.
					It mentioned this or that about "human rights" of students selected at middle schools. Not content with this, it floated story that there is doubt about whether university students would get proper education as they are engrossed in setting about creating great wealth of the nation. 
					
					These are renewed provocative outbursts let loose by the south Korean group of traitors to grossly tarnish the image of the DPRK over the issue of education of the younger generation, the most vital and dynamic forces of the society. 
					
					The south Korean tricksters revealed their ulterior intention by echoing the disgusting rubbish told by those defectors who ceased to be human beings.
					
					It is pitiable, indeed, for the group of traitors hell-bent on smear campaign to use even human scum who betrayed their country and families for hatching plots.
					
					Their paradoxical trumpeting only served the purpose of emphasizing the role played by the younger generation in the society. 
					
					The youngsters in the DPRK are the reliable and glorious heirs to the socialist cause.
					
					They have preserved and invariably carried forward the tradition of miracles and innovations fully displayed in the annals of the Korean revolution and the tradition of revolutionary optimism.
					
					It is the firm view of the young Koreans on life that they should not live merely for today but for tomorrow and it is their genuine life for them to enjoy happiness and honor in dedicating themselves to the country and the people.
					
					The above-said students are firmly preparing themselves as reliable pillars of the country well versed in science and practice amid the stirring reality of the socialist construction and talents capable of making a substantial contribution to the era of knowledge-based economy.
					
					For the students in the country socialist construction sites are theatres of their activities where they can feel proud of their patriotism and labor and can enhance their creative ingenuity and feel joyous in increasing the wealth of the country. For them they are, at the same time, one more revolutionary university.
					
					Keenly aware that science has no boundary but they have the great motherland, the young students will develop the nation's science and technology to the world standard more quickly.
					
					The large contingent of youngsters sound in thinking and will and morality and tempered amid stirring realities constitute inexhaustible potential and tremendous national power in the country.
					
					Thanks to such dependable younger generation, vanguard and main force for socialist constructions, the DPRK has strong courage and its future is in safe hands.
					
					The puppet group was so displeased with this great reality that it  described the best option of human life as one "going to a dark land."
					
					The Lee group can never understand the above-said truth as it regards as its physiology the view on life based on individualism that it is enough for one to live well, not caring about the fate of one's children. 
					
					It will be disheartened by the proud appearance of the young people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls upon Officials to Do Their Best for People
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls upon Officials to Do Their Best for People
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a bylined article calls on the officials to do more good things for the people.
					The slogan "Let us do more good things for people!" is the main subject and a militant banner for the general onward march in 2012, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					The slogan reflects the noble intention that the more difficult the situation becomes, the greater concern officials should show for the people. It also reflects the principle of giving top priority to the people's interests and conveniences and high requirement for providing the best things to all the people.
					
					The activities of the Workers' Party of Korea are always run through with the spirit of doing more good things for the people.
					
					One should have the stand that one should not have the view point that it is impossible to do under a difficult situation but should do the work to weather difficulties. This is the iron principle of the WPK.
					
					It is the stand of the WPK that one should do even a single good work for the people while putting other things on hold.
					
					Even in recent period when the country has a huge work to do and is in need of fund, modern apartment houses, theatres and fun-fairs are now under construction in different parts of the country and various kinds of foodstuffs are supplied to the people at cheap prices. This is a stirring reality.
					
					Let the world envy the Korean people! This is the ideal and aim of the WPK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses What S. Korean Authorities Seek through Hosting of "Nuclear Security Summit"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses What S. Korean Authorities Seek through Hosting of "Nuclear Security Summit"
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities' hosting of the "nuclear security summit" is a product of their scenario to escalate the nuclear racket against the DPRK and secure justification for provoking a nuclear war. 
					Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					The Lee group's scenario for staging an anti-DPRK nuclear confab under the pretext of "nuclear security" is aimed to hype the worn-out "theory of nuclear threat from the north" and justify the moves for a nuclear war against the north together with outside forces. 
					
					Another important aim sought by the group is to divert elsewhere public criticism inside south Korea and cement the ruling foundation at any cost through the forthcoming "parliamentary election." 
					
					It is the ulterior intention of the conservative group to stage madcap maneuvers for a war of aggression against the north with huge forces for aggression involved with the summit at hand and thus create a terror-ridden atmosphere of war in a bid to divert the public attention elsewhere. Another sinister aim sought by the group is to facelift its image through the hosting of the summit and the like and thus win as many seats as possible through the "parliamentary election."
					
					Traitor Lee Myung Bak is more dead than alive, isolated from the south Korean people. He is keen to serve a double purpose by hosting the "summit". This, however, will bring into bolder relief his true colors as a top class nuclear war servant of the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: S. Korea's Joint Military Drills with U.S. Condemned
articles.content:
S. Korea's Joint Military Drills with U.S. Condemned
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Yu Yong Jae, chief of the team in charge of the U.S. forces affairs of the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea, was interviewed by a reporter of Jaju Minbo on Feb. 27 in connection with the desperate war drills against the north kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and the puppet warmongers.
					The military drills simulating an all-out war, a limited war and "contingency" of someone are apparently offensive drills the keynote of which is to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and infiltrate massive armed forces to the north.
					
					The U.S. speaks loudly of the "dialogue" with the north in public but behind the scene it launches the military drills targeting its dialogue partner. This reveals its sinister aim not to give up its policy to stifle the DPRK, they noted.
					
					In order to tide over the danger of a war and ensure the peace on the Korean Peninsula, it is necessary for the bellicose forces to end the offensive drills against the north, cancel all the future plans of war drills, replace the Armistice Agreement with peace accord and abrogate the south Korea-U.S. alliance.
					
					In order to get the war drills for aggression stopped, the people should be awakened to their illegality so that they can turn out for the U.S. forces' withdrawal from south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Condemns Prosecution for Slandering Progressive Media
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Condemns Prosecution for Slandering Progressive Media
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Internet paper Jaju Minbo on Feb. 29 carried a prison letter of Representative Ri Chang Gi. The puppet Intelligence Agency arrested him on charges of violation of notorious "Security Law".
					The letter noted that the prosecution let the media spread the groundless allegation that Jaju Minbo went operational at the instructions of the north.
					
					It went on:
					
					Articles carried in Jaju Minbo deal with information officially representing the judgment of each individual reporter. Therefore, those articles have proper reasoning behind them.
					
					Jaju Minbo made active coverage of the efforts for implementation of the south-north joint declarations and the improvement of the inter-Korean relations. The crackdown upon it is aimed to create an atmosphere favorable for the "government" and the ruling party with the election at hand.
					
					The prosecution started wildcat investigation to fabricate the "north wind", the letter said, adding that the reporters of Jaju Minbo would concentrate all efforts on the struggle to judge the Lee "government".
					
					It will bring the case to the international organization and take legal proceedings against the "government", in particular, the letter said.

articles.title: Stop to U.S.-S. Korea's Drills against DPRK Called for
articles.content:
Stop to U.S.-S. Korea's Drills against DPRK Called for
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. in a statement on Feb. 28 urged the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group to immediately stop the dangerous DPRK-targeted war exercises that may bring the dark clouds of a war to hang over the Korean Peninsula.
					The statement accused the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers of kicking off the war drills against the north despite the demands of the people at home and abroad for the peace on the Peninsula and reunification.
					
					The statement queried what the Lee Myung Bak "government" sought by kicking off the war exercises against the north, while talking about "dialogue".
					
					The Lee "government" has escalated the tension on the Peninsula to an extreme pitch with war drills against the north, not content with quenching the compatriots' desire for reunification and fraying the north-south relations during its term of office. Its treacherous and anti-reunification actions are bound to meet with the judgment of the nation. 
					
					They are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can frighten the north with the war drills. They should clearly understand that they can never quell the nation's desire for reunification.

articles.title: Finnish Personage Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Finnish Personage Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, made public a statement on Feb. 24 in denunciation of the U.S.-S. Korea joint military drills.
					He noted that the U.S. and the conservative "government" of south Korea are staging ceaseless joint military drills against the DPRK in the Korean Peninsula, adding: The Finland－Korea Society expresses concern over the fact that the provocative military exercises of the U.S. and south Korea will disturb peace and stability in Asia and more adversely affect the efforts for the reunification of Korea and, therefore, bitterly denounces it.
					
					The ongoing saber-rattling is an undisguised military provocation to increase the military pressure upon the DPRK and stifle it.
					
					The U.S. should stop the war drills against the DPRK and the acts of egging south Korea onto anti-DPRK campaign but pull its forces out of south Korea as soon as possible and take practical measures for ensuring peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					Korea should be reunified in accordance with the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo put forward by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					We will always stand by the Korean people and express invariable support and solidarity with their cause of peace and independent reunification.

articles.title: Day of Sun and Day of Shining Star Commemorated in Vietnam
articles.content:
Day of Sun and Day of Shining Star Commemorated in Vietnam
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Events including meeting, art performance and photo exhibition  took place in Vietnam on Feb. 22 to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					On display there were photos of the revolutionary exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					The participants paid a moment's silence in the memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					Pham Tat Dong, chairman of the Vietnamese preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and chairman of the Vietnam－DPRK Friendship Association, said in his speech:
					
					President Kim Il Sung was the great leader of the Korean people, a prominent activist of the international labor movement and a close friend of the Vietnamese people.
					
					The Workers' Party of Korea headed by General Secretary         Kim Jong Il led the Korean people, true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung, and achieved great successes in carrying out socialist construction and the cause of peace and reunification of the country.
					
					We wish the fraternal Korean people fresh successes in the struggle for the building of a thriving nation and the country's reunification under the leadership of the WPK headed by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Put on the stage of the art performance were colorful numbers of teachers and children of the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Kyongsang Kindergarten and the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten. They included the immortal revolutionary hymns "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il", "Footsteps", "Song of Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten" and piano ensemble "Korea Is One".
					
					Meanwhile, friendly meetings, meetings, photo exhibitions, film shows and art performances took place in Syria, Spain and Pakistan from Feb. 15 to 21 to commemorate the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Cuba
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Cuba
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification was held in Havana on Feb. 22.
					It summed up last year's work and discussed this year's action program.
					
					It underlined the need to organize colorful political and cultural events on the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					
					Present there were Alicia Corredera, vice-president of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, Juan Vela Valdes, chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, officials concerned and members of the Committee.
					
					The DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of his embassy were present on invitation.

articles.title: Bright Future of Korea's Reunification: Beninese Figure
articles.content:
Bright Future of Korea's Reunification: Beninese Figure
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Pascal, rector of the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin, issued a statement on Feb. 21 in support of the report released by the Institute for Disarmament and Peace of the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					He said:
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il formulated the Three Principles of National Reunification, the 10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation and the Proposal for Founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the Three Charters for National Reunification, thus providing all Koreans with an undying banner to be held aloft by them. His feats are recognized not only by the Korean people but the people the world over.
					
					To establish an independent unified state by federal formula constitutes an important content of the three charters.
					
					The proposal for reunifying the country by federal formula is the best proposal for guaranteeing the security on the Korean Peninsula as it is a reasonable and fair and aboveboard reunification formula which does not seek the supremacy or interest of one side only. 
					
					Korea's reunification was the lifelong desire of Kim Jong Il.
					
					To realize his desire is the way of glorifying the feats performed by him for the cause of reunification.
					
					The future of Korea's reunification is bright and all the Koreans will be able to live in the country reunified independently and peacefully under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme leader.

articles.title: Nepalese Personage Lauds DPRK
articles.content:
Nepalese Personage Lauds DPRK
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Nepalese newspaper Arpan on Feb. 24 carried the article captioned "DPRK, great country of Juche" written by Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics.
					All the astonishing achievements made in the DPRK are based on the Juche idea, the article noted, adding:
					
					Under the banner of the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung the DPRK proudly appeared in the international arena a developed country and the Korean people a great people.
					
					It is the only DPRK in the world where the Juche idea has been applied to all fields and where free educational and health care systems are enforced and people are free from all taxes. 
					
					The Korean people are confident that the Juche idea serves as a powerful weapon for carving out their destiny and will glorify it as a great idea guiding the building of the socialist state.
					
					Though the great leader Kim Jong Il passed away all of a sudden, the cause of Juche revolution will certainly be accomplished and the DPRK will achieve fresher progress in the future as it holds the dear respected Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the supreme leader.

articles.title: Thailand to Make Efforts for Development of Relations with WPK: Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Thailand to Make Efforts for Development of Relations with WPK: Political Party Leader
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The deputy prime minister and concurrently minister of Interior of Thailand who is chairman of the Party for Thailand, on Feb. 24 met An Song Nam, DPRK ambassador to Thailand.
					The chairman said:
					
					I, on behalf of the Party for Thailand and the Thai government, express most profound condolences over the demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					I was deeply moved to see on TV the Korean people rising up, rallied behind the dear respected Kim Jong Un in single mind.
					
					The Party for Thailand will make positive efforts to boost relations with the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un, Focus of Worldwide Attention
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un, Focus of Worldwide Attention
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, an Internet newspaper of Koreans in the United States, on Feb. 24 carried its correspondent's article on the commemorations of the Day of the Shining Star (Feb. 16), the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The recent successful commemorations, in the wake of the events held to mourn over the demise of Kim Jong Il last year, were attributable to the leadership ability of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, and they evoked lively response from among overseas Koreans and foreigners who took part in them, the article noted, and said:
					
					Kim Jong Un has been designated as one of the ten famous persons in the world after he began making public appearance in September 2010.
					
					The U.S. weekly magazine Times, well known in the Western society, highlighted him in its last issue of February.
					
					Posted in GOOGLE were more than 67.40 million English news stories about Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, or 230 000 per hour, in 10 odd days of December last year after the demise of Kim Jong Il.
					
					If the news items in other languages are added, the figure is believed to be much higher, an indication that the international community is paying close attention to Kim Jong Un.
					
					As the youngest leader in the world, he began drawing the greatest attention in the shortest period ever in the history of humankind, striking the world with admiration, the article said.
					
					On Feb. 20 supreme leader Kim Jong Un's political activities again became the focus of attention of the world political circles and media, it noted, adding that all media in the world have highlighted his activities after he officially appeared on the political arena.

articles.title: China Agrees Cooperation with Nepal and Venezuela
articles.content:
China Agrees Cooperation with Nepal and Venezuela
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Nepal and China have agreed to strengthen and enhance the coordination in the fields of forest conservation and management on Feb. 25.
					And before this business representatives of Venezuela and China signed on Friday two significant cooperation agreements in the fields of oil and mining.

articles.title: Russia Will Not Abandon Means for Ensuring Security: PM
articles.content:
Russia Will Not Abandon Means for Ensuring Security: PM
Moscow, February 29 (KCNA) -- Russian Prime Minister Vladimir Putin clarified the stand not to give up the means for ensuring state security. 
					Speaking at a recent meeting on state security problem he said he would not give up anything that is needed for the country.
					
					Russia will not abandon any of the means for ensuring security including tactical nuclear weapons, he added.

articles.title: Russia and Belarus Oppose West Sanctions
articles.content:
Russia and Belarus Oppose West Sanctions
Moscow, February 29 (KCNA) -- Russian President Dmitri Medvedev and Byelorussian President Aleksandr Lukashenko in a recent joint statement clarified their stands of opposing the West sanctions on Belarus.
					In response to the U.S. and West sanctions on Belarus, the statement said Russia and Belarus do not allow any economic pressure or appliance of high-handed measures in relations among states.
					
					Such measures amount to infringing on the legal economic interests of states and will adversely affect the ordinary people, in particular, it said.
					
					Only dialogues based on equality and respect for each other can help remove international misunderstanding, it said, stressing any action laying an obstacle in the efforts for the dialogue should be refrained.

articles.title: Sanctions Cannot Affect Iran's Progress: Iran's FM
articles.content:
Sanctions Cannot Affect Iran's Progress: Iran's FM
Tehran, February 29 (KCNA) -- Iran's Foreign Minister Ali Akbar Salehi said on Monday sanctions can not affect Iran's progress and development. 
					He said that unilateral sanctions on Iran imposed by certain governments are against international law and independence and impartiality of those countries.
					
					Pointing to Iranian potentials and capabilities, Salehi said Iran's geopolitical position in the region made it resistant to the sanctions targeting its economic progress.

articles.title: 1st Vice President: World Arrogance Frightened by Iranian Progress
articles.content:
1st Vice President: World Arrogance Frightened by Iranian Progress
Tehran, February 29 (KCNA) -- First Vice-President of Iran Mohammad Reza Rahimi on Monday acclaimed Iranian scientific progress and said that the World Arrogance has been frightened by eye-catching advances Iran achieved. 
					Rahimi said all enemies' pressures and sanctions on Iran are not only because nuclear energy but they are frightened with the progress Iran has made. 
					
					He said that they attempted to stop Iranians in their way to progress and advancements. 
					
					He said that Iran today is very different from yesterday because Iran has currently many words to say to world people in the field of science and technology while it is tolerating pressures and economic sanctions.

articles.title: Palestinian Official Accuses Israeli PM of Inciting against Abbas
articles.content:
Palestinian Official Accuses Israeli PM of Inciting against Abbas
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu incited against Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas and denied his government's acts on the ground, a Palestinian official said Monday.
					"We strongly condemn this provocative statement that shows the continuation of Netanyahu's campaign against President Abbas and the Palestinian National Authority (PNA)," said Saeb Erekat, a senior Palestinian negotiator.
					
					The statement "denies the facts that Israel builds and expands settlements, making arrests, assassinations, incursions and closure," said Erekat.

articles.title: Pakistani Lawmaker Supports Iran's Peaceful Nuclear Program
articles.content:
Pakistani Lawmaker Supports Iran's Peaceful Nuclear Program
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Pakistani lawmaker on Monday said that Iran should be allowed to acquire peaceful nuclear technology without any pressure. 
					Talking to IRNA, Senator Mir Lashkari Raisani of the Pakistan People's Party asked if U.S. and Israel along with many other countries can have nuclear warheads then why Iran is not allowed to pursue a peaceful nuclear program. 
					
					He said being signatory to Non-Proliferation Treaty, it is Iran's right to develop a peaceful nuclear program without any external pressure. 
					
					It is amazing to see that Iran today is developing in all fields despite western curbs, said the politician.

articles.title: Thousands Stage Rallies against U.S. Resolution on Human Rights in Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Thousands Stage Rallies against U.S. Resolution on Human Rights in Sri Lanka
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Sri Lankans staged massive demonstrations across the country on Monday against a U.S. sponsored resolution against Sri Lanka scheduled to be presented at the 19th session of the UN Human Rights Council (UNHRC) in Geneva. Thousands of people took part in demonstrations.
					A massive demonstration was also held in the capital Colombo with several government ministers attending and speaking against the proposed resolution.
					
					They said that the protests would be continued until the alleged resolution against Sri Lanka to be defeated.

articles.title: Indonesia Reports Fourth Bird Flu Death This Year in Bali
articles.content:
Indonesia Reports Fourth Bird Flu Death This Year in Bali
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A 12-year-old Indonesian boy has died of bird flu in the country's tourist resort of Bali, bringing the death toll of the fatal disease to four this year, the health ministry reported on Monday.
					He was tested positive of having been infected with the avian influenza virus H5N1, the ministry said in a statement.

articles.title: U.S. Planned Military Base Construction in Dominica Protested
articles.content:
U.S. Planned Military Base Construction in Dominica Protested
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- There was a protest rally in Dominica against the U.S. plan to set up a military base in the country.
					Members of social organizations of the country took part.
					
					The participants said the U.S. has the history of having invaded their country and is being engrossed in the military interference on the international arena. The U.S. plan for the military base is unreasonable in view of politics, economy, society and environment. 
					
					The base can be misused for aggression against such progressive regional countries as Cuba and Venezuela, they said, clarifying the stand to carry on the actions against the base construction.

articles.title: Cuba Denounces U.S. International Law Violations
articles.content:
Cuba Denounces U.S. International Law Violations
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Cuba denounced on Wednesday before the World Trade Organization the permanent violations of the U.S. government to the regulations and principles of international law.
					Speaking before the Dispute Settlement Body (DSB) in the WTO, Cuban counsellor Nancy Madrigal mentioned the maintenance of Section 211 of the (US) Omnibus Law of Budgetary Assignments of 1998. Madrigal said that Section 211 attacks the rights of Cuban brands, and one of its purposes is to facilitate the Bacardi firm the fraudulent and illegal sale of a rum which is not produced in Cuba, under the name of Havana Club.
					
					In another part of her intervention Madrigal said that the recently concluded World Radio Communication Conference ratified the illegality of anti-Cuban radio and television transmissions by US authorities, by means of the use of airplanes.  She said that Cuba will not stop defending all its sovereignty attributes and will keep on demanding that US government fulfil its judicial obligations, as a WTO member, and as a member of the international community.

articles.title: Sauli Niinisto Elected President of Finland
articles.content:
Sauli Niinisto Elected President of Finland
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Sauli Niinisto was elected president of Finland.
					He won majority of supporting votes in the recent presidential election.

articles.title: Publicado llamamiento conjunto N-S
articles.content:
Publicado llamamiento conjunto N-S
Pyongyang, 1 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 93o aniversario del Levantamiento Popular del Primero de Marzo, el Consejo por la Reunificacion de la Nacion de Tangun de la parte Norte y el Consejo por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Nacion de Tangun de la parte Sur hicieron publico un llamamiento conjunto. 
					El texto completo va como sigue: 
					
					Hoy se cumple el 93o aniversario del Levantamiento Popular del Primero de Marzo, registrado con letras doradas en la historia de la lucha de la nacion coreana contra las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Nos oyen todavia el impetu antijapones y el reclamo por la independencia de la nacion coreana que lucho con valentia sin doblegarse ante los fusiles y espadas de los imperialistas japoneses para rescatar la soberania del pais. 
					
					Aunque transcurrieron 93 anos desde aquella sublevacion popular, los desastres y perdidas causados por los imperialistas japoneses dejaron profundas heridas en el corazon de todos los integrantes  de la nacion coreana. 
					
					Sin embargo, lejos de pedir sinceras disculpas y hacer indemnizacion por sus enormes crimenes, el pais isleno acecha la oportunidad de nueva agresion recurriendo a la cinica tergiversacion de la historia y la usurpacion del islote coreano Tok. 
					
					En adhesion a tales maniobras de Japon, las fuerzas gobernantes conservadoras del Sur de Corea intentan vender a Japon ese sagrado territorio patrio.
					
					La realidad de hoy urge a toda la nacion coreana de 70 millones unirse como un solo hombre para saldar cuenta final de los crimenes del pasado de Japon, expulsar de este territorio a la horda de traidores y lograr la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion y la causa historica de paz y  reunificacion. 
					
					Para cumplir el deber de miembros de la nacion de Tangun ante la demanda de connacionales y la llamada de la epoca, exhortamos fervientemente a todos los integrantes de la nacion coreana en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar. 
					
					Despleguemos con mas dinamismo el movimiento masivo para cobrar el perdon y la indemnizacion de Japon por sus tremendos crimenes del pasado. 
					
					Con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion frustremos tajantemente el resurgimiento del militarismo japones y sus maniobras de nueva agresion. 
					
					La independencia es la vida de la nacion. Y la dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras es la muerte. 
					
					Con la posicion de la independencia nacional y de dar preferencia a la nacion coreana, avivamos mas las llamas contra las fuerzas extranjeras y por la independencia y rechacemos la intervencion y la presion injustas de las fuerzas foraneas. 
					
					No perdonemos jamas los actos vendepatrias y traidores de las fuerzas conservadoras que persiguen el servilismo a las grandes potencias y la dependencia de las fuerzas foraneas. 
					
					Apoyemos y defendamos firmemente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programa de ejecucion de la primera. 
					
					Este ano del 5o aniversario de la historica Declaracion del 4 de Octubre unamos mano a mano con las entidades y personalidades que desean la ejecucion de las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y aspiran a la paz y la reunificacion y hagamos reinar en todo el territorio el ambiente de apoyar y ejecutar las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur. 
					
					Logremos la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales e impulsemos la era de reunificacion del 15 de Junio. 
					
					Todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar frustremos, con las fuerzas unidas, a las fuerzas anti-reunificacion dentro y fuera del pais y hagamos del presente un ano de triunfo de las fuerzas patrioticas pro-reunificacion. 
					
					En estos momentos tambien se libran los actos de guerra muy aventureros que amenazan el destino de la nacion y puedan acarrear los desastres nucleares. 
					
					Levantemonos como un solo hombre en el movimiento anti-guerra y por la paz para frustrar rotundamente las imprudentes maniobras belicas que amenazan la seguridad de la nacion y la paz de la patria. 
					
					En este mundo no existe una fuerza capaz de detener la gran marcha por la independencia y la reunificacion de la nacion coreana que avanza a pasos firmes exaltando el impetu de la nacion homogenea fundada por Tangun. 
					
					Rechacemos todos los desafios a la reunificacion y desarrollemos vigorosamente el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria, llenos de nueva conviccion y unidos bajo la bandera de las historicas declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur, y abramos sin falta este ano la brecha de la independencia, la paz y la reunificacion.

articles.title: Parten de regreso Jong Myong Hun y su comitiva
articles.content:
Parten de regreso Jong Myong Hun y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 1 de marzo (ACNC) -- Partieron este jueves de esta capital Jong Myong Hun, director musical de la Orquesta Sinfonica Municipal de Seul y de la Orquesta Filarmonica de la Radio de Francia, y su comitiva.

articles.title: Enterrados restos mortales de Pak Thae Son en Cementerio de Martires
articles.content:
Enterrados restos mortales de Pak Thae Son en Cementerio de Martires
Pyongyang, 1 de marzo (ACNC) -- Fueron enterrados este jueves en el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos radicado en las afueras de esta capital los restos mortales del Heroe de la Republica, Pak Thae Son, quien era extractor del quinto peloton de la galeria Yonggwang de la Mina de Kumgol del Complejo Minero de Komdok.
					El heroe sacrifico su vida despues de salvar a los camaradas revolucionarios en un momento crucial. 
					
					El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un evaluo altamente sus meritos heroicos e hizo otorgarle el titulo del Heroe de la Republica. 
					
					En la ceremonia de enterramiento estuvieron presentes los funcionarios correspondientes, los funcionarios y mineros del Complejo Minero de Komdok, los familiares y parientes del difunto. 
					
					Tras depositar las ofrendas y ramos florales, los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del difunto.

articles.title: ACNC desmiente nuevos disparates de la banda surcoreana
articles.content:
ACNC desmiente nuevos disparates de la banda surcoreana
Pyongyang, 1 de marzo (ACNC) -- Pese a las denuncias de los nacionales y extranjeros, la banda de traidores surcoreanos inicio por fin en contubernio con Estados Unidos los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle". 
					En referencia a la advertencia de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea al respecto, la autoridad del "gobierno" surcoreano la parafraseo como expresion del "extremado estres" que sufre la RPDC y anadio que esta "estaria por volverse loca por tener que librar los ejercicios de respuesta".
					
					Es una interpretacion equivocada de la voluntad de la RPDC de responder rotundamente a esas maniobras.
					
					Responder con la venganza a la "venganza" de los enemigos, y con la guerra total a la guerra total, esto es el principio revolucionario y la posicion intransigente de la RPDC. 
					
					Si EE.UU. y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos invaden, aunque sea 0.001 mm, el sagrado cielo, tierra y mar de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, los militares y civiles coreanos destruiran el bastion de los agresores movilizando todos los medios incluso el disuasivo nuclear. 
					
					La advertencia de la RPDC represento tal conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo. 
					
					La provocacion mas grave a la RPDC sucedio cuando la autoridad del gobierno surcoreano describio el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" como "desahogo de ira" del Norte de Corea encolerizado por los ejercicios "Key Resolve". 
					
					Hace dos anos, la banda de traidores surcoreanos, enloquecida por la confrontacion fratricida, orquesto ese complot anti-RPDC en el curso de los simulacros "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" sacrificando la vida de decenas de marineros surcoreanos. 
					
					La banda surcoreana volvio a describir el caso como "provocacion del Norte" coincidiendo con el inicio de "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle", ejercicios que constituyen el ensayo de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC. 
					
					Al repetir el caso de "Cheonan", la camarilla del traidor Lee Myung Bak, repudiada por la opinion publica surcoreana, quiere ganar cierta popularidad y llevar al extremo las relaciones Norte-Sur. 
					
					Nadie puede imaginar el poderio de la autodefensa nacional de la RPDC lista tanto para la guerra local como para la total. 
					
					Los militares y civiles coreanos estan dispuestos a librar el combate final para castigar despiadadamente a los enemigos que se abalancen imprudentemente. 
					
					Los enemigos se responsabilizaran totalmente de lo que suceda por haber desoido la reiterada y suficiente advertencia de la RPDC. 
					
					La banda de traidores surcoreanas debe actuar con razon.

articles.title: ACNC critica periodico online surcoreano
articles.content:
ACNC critica periodico online surcoreano
Pyongyang, 1 de marzo (ACNC) -- Al repetir un articulo insertado en el periodico online "New Focus",  "Seul Sinmun"(internet) del Sur de Corea cuestiono la formacion de los integrantes de la nueva generacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea difundiendo un rumor de tales o cuales derechos humanos de los alumnos seleccionados en la escuela secundaria y de que es "sospechoso si puedan recibir debidamente la ensenanza" los universitarios movilizados en la creacion de grandes riquezas de la patria.
					Es otra provocacion de la banda de los traidores surcoreanos tendentes a deshonrar la imagen de la RPDC acusando a los jovenes de la nueva generacion, fuerzas mas potentes de la sociedad.
					
					Los intrigantes utilizaron hasta las palabrerias de los fugitivos, basuras humanas, para manchar la imagen de la RPDC.
					
					Los integrantes de la nueva generacion de la RPDC heredan fidedignamente la causa socialista.
					
					Gracias a ellas, siguen defendiendose sin alteracion la tradicion de milagros e innovaciones demostrada plenamente en los anales de nuestra revolucion y la tradicion de optimismo revolucionario.
					
					Vivir no para hoy sino para manana, esto es la concepcion de vida de nuestros jovenes.
					
					Ellos toman como verdadera felicidad y gloria  dedicar  todo lo suyo a la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Nuestros estudiantes estan preparandose con mas firmeza en la practica de la construccion socialista como trabajadores dignos y confiables del pais, dotados de la ciencia y la capacidad practica, y como personas competentes capaces de contribuir realmente a la epoca de economia intelectual.
					
					Para ellos, el campo de construccion socialista constituye un lugar de formacion del patriotismo, el orgullo sobre el trabajo y la capacidad creadora y les siembra el jubilo de incrementar los bienes de la patria.
					
					Los universitarios jovenes experimentan profundamente el hecho de que en la ciencia no hay frontera, pero, para nosotros hay la gran patria, gracias a lo cual la ciencia y la tecnologia de nuestro pais alcanzaran con mas rapidez la cima de la tecnologia mas alta de este siglo.
					
					Numerosos jovenes de la nueva generacion sanos en lo ideo-volitivo y moral y forjados en la practica constituyen la inagotable potencialidad y poderosa fuerza nacional.
					
					Merced a los fidedignos jovenes de la nueva generacion, vanguardia y fuerza principal de la construccion de potencia socialista, es fuerte nuestra determinacion y radiante nuestro porvenir.
					
					Muy celosa ante los grandes acontecimientos de la RPDC, la banda titere revolco toda la realidad de nuestro pais con la intencion de denigrarlos.
					
					No podra entenderlo la banda de Lee aunque nace cien veces, cuya concepcion de vida esta basada en el individualismo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a enarbolar bandera de independencia nacional
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a enarbolar bandera de independencia nacional
Pyongyang, 1 de marzo (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun inserto este jueves el editorial dedicado al 93o aniversario del Levantamiento Popular del Primero de Marzo.
					Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben levantarse en la lucha pannacional por la reunificacion de la patria para abrir, cueste lo que cueste, este ano la brecha de la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de la patria, destaca el periodico y continua:
					
					El Levantamiento Popular del Primero de Marzo fue una resistencia patriotica antijaponesa en que toda la nacion coreana lucho por rescatar el pais arrebatado por los imperialistas japoneses y realizar la soberania e independencia.
					
					Aunque transcurrio casi un siglo desde aquel entonces, todavia no se ha realizado en escala nacional el deseo de los martires que derramaron su sangre patriotica por la independencia del pais y la soberania de la nacion.
					
					Hoy el obstaculo principal que estorba la soberania de la nacion coreana es la dominacion e intervencion de las fuerzas foraneas y las maniobras conflictivas contra la RPDC de las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas que obedecen a ellas.
					
					Al frustrar rotundamente las maniobras agresivas de las fuerzas extranjeras y de traicion de los vendepatrias enarbolando la bandera de la independencia nacional, podremos abrir de par en par las puertas de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Esto es la verdad de la historia que todos los coreanos vuelven a experimentar profundamente con motivo del 93o aniversario del  dicho levantamiento popular.
					
					Toda la nacion coreana en el interior y exterior del pais deben levantarse dinamicamente en la lucha pannacional por realizar la reunificacion de la patria con el inconmovible espiritu independiente de rechazar las fuerzas foraneas agresoras y la voluntad patriotica de aniquilar con las fuerzas de los connacionales a todos los agresores y los vendepatrias.
					
					Bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre tienen que concentrar todas sus fuerzas en la lucha por abrir las puertas de la reintegracion territorial.
					
					Por otra parte, el periodico Minju Joson difundio en su edicion un articulo individual dedicado a esa efemeride demandando a Japon liquidar el pasado manchado de sangre.
